website_summaries.verdict: Affordable 6-piece accessory set with the most common air fryer accessories.
pros: Includes a silicone cake pan, cake barrel, metal holder, pizza pan, rack with skewers, and a silicone mat
Dishwasher-safe, although it's best to hand wash metal accessories
cons: Some experienced some rusting after cleaning in the dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet effective
customer_reviews.text: The items arrived very quickly, gotta love Prime. I haven't used the cupcake pan yet but I have used the pan and pot. The description calls them something different but in all actuality they are a pot and pan. I was worried that they would have had an over powering "chemical" smell like my air fryer did for several days but these arrived odorless. Great overall simple construction. I feel the price was a little high and they could have included a tool to help remove the very hot items from the air fryer. I would recommend this to anyone looking for these accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtanium

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: All pieces looked to be well made. Used the cake pan to bake a cake in my Philips airfryer. The chocolate zucchini cake came out perfectly. Reduced the regular baking temperature from 350 to 320 and the time from 37 to 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: StayAtHomeDad

customer_reviews.title: Low quality moldy
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve only used the pizza pan from this set and it’s pretty bad quality I’ve used it only 3 times and after I washed it I was super gentle washing this I used a soft washcloth didn’t use anything aggressive because it’s coated non stick duh. It still chipped and pealed really bad and easily Almost like it had paint on it and wiped off easy. And on top of that when it peeled underneath has this ugly rotten old looking metal That looks like they painted over to cover.
customer_reviews.author: khadija

customer_reviews.title: Hand Wash Non-Stick Pans
customer_reviews.text: I used my double stack rack right after I opened the package; it was great to increase my surface area and air fry twice the amount of cauliflower in one batch. I use the double stack rack every time I air fry, very handy. The silicon hot pad is a nice feature and it protects my quartz counter tops. I washed the pans in my dishwasher the first time but I will hand wash all future cleanings because I noticed that a small amount of rust water came out from beneath the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for all Air Fryer users!!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my air fryer, it allows me to do more than I ever imagined!
customer_reviews.author: Special Kay

customer_reviews.title: Works with NuWave Airfryer
customer_reviews.text: This worked great with my NuWave 3 quart fryer. I was worried that it wouldnt, but have used it many times and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for me
customer_reviews.text: Wish the racks were teflon. Also wish that there was less space in the little racks (not sure what you would call those things). Food falls right threw. Other than that we use these for everything. Take a little Pam spray to keep from sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Informative info for you!
customer_reviews.text: Okay. I went back and forth trying to decide if this air fryer accessory set will fit the 4 quart fryer I just purchased. The reviews were so confusing. So I posted pics for you. This is a 4 quart air fryer and each piece of this accessory set fits, in my opinion, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: S. Zachery

customer_reviews.title: Not sure of time and temp for mini muffins
customer_reviews.text: Will have to experiment with temp and time for the mini muffins as they were perfect brown on top but uncooked batter on the bottom. No suggested temp/time instructions use came with it.
customer_reviews.author: SmokyMtn

customer_reviews.title: Protective covering comes off
customer_reviews.text: Sure easy to clean and some stuff okay but this gets rust right away and the protective covering on the little pan litteraly pealed off because I had water in it . I didn't use the other little pot yet but it's covered in the same protective barrier. I wonder how much rust and chemicals I'm eating with this crap. Actually I use it to catch grease now when I put stuff on a rack.
customer_reviews.author: J. aikin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for my Ninja
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I got a Ninja air fryer as a gift. When I learned just how much you can do with it, I had to get the other pans. I made a chocolate cake, perfect size for 2 people, it baked up delicious! This morning we made cinnamon sugar donut muffins in the silicone muffin pan. So easy, quick and clean up was a breeze. This pan set is the perfect fit for my Ninja.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Perry

customer_reviews.title: would like to see an accessory kit for the larger Air
customer_reviews.text: On the small side, would like to see an accessory kit for the larger Air Fryers
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Problems with the plate
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when I received my box with all the accessories for my air fryer, but unfortunately after the third use of this plate (it is the only one I have used so far) some bubbles appeaared and some parts are peeled.
customer_reviews.author: Mabel

customer_reviews.title: Most of the set is great, one item badly dented
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to getting this set. When I opened the boxes everything was fine until I got to the pizza pan. It has a nice sized dent in one area near the bottom. The boxes were intact and had no damage. I sent an email to Cozyna and have heard nothing. Rest of set is fine and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Sue

customer_reviews.title: The pans rust quickly, not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The sizes are just right for our Air Fryer but the two pans rusted very quickly and are not useful now. The nonstick coating on the pans flakes off and the bare metal underneath rusts. The rest of the items are OK, but we didn't use them very much. So all-in-all it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: crtee

customer_reviews.title: d
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than expected and would want the muffin tin to be of metal next time the plastic mold is hard to clean and hard to get stuff out in one piece
customer_reviews.author: Ms Colorado

customer_reviews.title: It was great, for a few months
customer_reviews.text: After some use, one of the accesories became like that, even when being cleaned softly . It seems that they are no that good quality so beware.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Second set I've ordered
customer_reviews.text: I like having back-up supplies of this type. These are well made, and fit great in my 3.8qt air fryer (Cozyna). I haven't "baked" in it yet- but am looking forward to making some small cakes- with the second set of pans, I can have the second one waiting while the first one bakes and cools.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Every piece fits into the Nu-Wave Brio 3qt air fryer except the pizza pan. The picture shows the pan as being 7" but it closer to 8" because of the lip. It just sits on top of the basket. So I can't use that. Other than that pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Markajv

customer_reviews.title: coating coming off
customer_reviews.text: coating started coming off after 3 or 4 uses .. I don't think eating that is going to be good for you
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Well made and good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This Accessories set is very well made and I can’t wait to use it. All the pans and racks fit my Cozyna smaller air fryer just fine. I plan to try chicken satay on skewers and the rack first.
customer_reviews.author: T. C. Rouzer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I have a Ninja AF and these products have helped tremendously. The muffins I made were better than in the oven. I have used the pizza pan for stir fry veggies. There are only 2 of us so I do not need large amounts of food. Have used the rack for bacon and it does not curl as much. Love these products.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Dryden

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: bought these awhile back and am impressed with their uses and how they are holding up with repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: Groovy Taterbug

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is and reasonable priced. I only really wanted the cooking rack, I doubt that I will use the other pieces much if at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety
customer_reviews.text: The variety is nice. A little small for my air fryer but that's ok. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coating fell off
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of them. Good for my 6 qt air fryer. The price is also good. However, the small pan is not easy to clean with eggs. I did spray some oil before hand. The coating fell off easily during cleaning. So have to find a new small pan.
customer_reviews.author: Audrea Liu

customer_reviews.title: Airfryer accessories
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy !!! Can’t love these airfryer additions Easy to clean, useful and durable Works great for my 3.2 quart airfryer
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Wobschall

customer_reviews.title: Cute little air fryer accessories.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used these yet but I made sure they fit in my Ninja Air Fryer and they fit perfectly. It’s definitely not intended for a large meal. I would say one to two people max. They seem to be very sturdy and durable. Only complaint I have is it says it comes with a recipe book and there was no recipe book included. I’m anxious to put there to use.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Fits Power Air Fryer XL
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister for Christmas. Not sure if she's used them yet, but she has a Power Air Fryer XL. All the attachments fit nicely in there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my air fryer
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok product but it too small for what I wanted it for. Would have returned it but the time ran out as I didn’t use it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking utensils
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my air fryer has all the things you need I even use something’s for my insta pot now
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Air Fryer Accessories
customer_reviews.text: I have used several of these utensils already in my air fryer. They were priced right, and are good quality. Must have if you have an air fryer.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: I've used some of the recipes and pans. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L

customer_reviews.title: Just received this item today, was delivered in two ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received this item today, was delivered in two days. Wash it up and used already, made a chocolate cake and turned out good

customer_reviews.title: Air Fryer Accessories
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. If you plan on using air fryer you will need the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Judilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I love my air fryer and so these kit is just a must have!! It helps me making even more different dishes with the air fryer and makes the clean up easy too!

customer_reviews.title: Made Frying Easy
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, but had to return it. Needed the bigger size. Definitely worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd be able to cook more items at once but the pieces are so small they are not very helpful. Seem to be made of nice materials but I don't really recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PANS
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PANS , FITS MY AIRFRYER PERFECTLY.....I HAVE THE 5.6QT AND NO PROBLEMS AT ALL.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: expands the use of the air fryer greatly and allows greater use of the cookbooks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love using my air fryer....these products took my air fried food items to the next level
customer_reviews.text: I love making banana bread muffins and brownies and a whole bunch of other things in the air fryer! This brand of accessories are well made and helps me provide tasty, well cooked meals for my family! If you have an air fryer and don't have these accessories....you are missing out!

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Pan Review
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set in mid May of this year. The pizza pan's coating is wearing off. Not happy with this item. The rest of the set sees to be holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L. Green

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my new air fryer! All the accessories all work great and are a big help!
customer_reviews.author: Jonnie Edinburgh

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Seem well made, and although they aren't very large in size, they fit the air fryer and do the job. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: I still like them but they could have been a little bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: little small. make sure you pay attention to what size fryer you have. I still like them but they could have been a little bigger to fit my air fryer perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Love all the accessories
customer_reviews.text: Love all the accessories! I have a Faberware 3.4 quart air fryer and everything fits perfectly with a little room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if you are only cooking for one or two people!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Gwen Castello

customer_reviews.title: Really like these accessories for my air fryer
customer_reviews.text: Really like these accessories for my air fryer. They have expanded the number of items I can make in it. Not real excited about the muffin pan, but everything else is good.

customer_reviews.title: VERY EASY TO USE AND LOCKS IN FLAVOR
customer_reviews.text: Unlike Microwave which may dry up your food or result in flavor loss, this fryer locks in flavor and very versatile

customer_reviews.title: Fit in smaller air fryers also!
customer_reviews.text: love this set! Although it says that it is for the 3.2 Q and up, I have a smaller air fryer (2.7 I think) and they fit! I was very excited to find products that fit!

customer_reviews.title: Good set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love the set, but the cake pan is chipping it’s Teflon.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like childs set when I took if from the packaging
customer_reviews.text: Product is small. Looks like childs set when I took if from the packaging, but it works for what the fryer will do.

customer_reviews.title: Dandy set to own
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the set that I purchased. Quality material and just the right thing for my air fryer. It has a decent warranty and easy to use and clean.

customer_reviews.text: The skewer accessory had what first appeared to be rust on it. After repeated scrubbing s, whatever the substance was came off.

customer_reviews.title: Yay!! Diet friendly fried chicken!!
customer_reviews.text: Absoutey love my new Cozyna Air Fryer. Easy, easy to use. I’ve been Weight Watchers for a year and lost 50 lbs. I missed having breaded chicken cutlets. Well, now I can!!! That’s the first thing I made. They came out great, nicely crisp and took 10 minutes. And didn’t have the mess of oil and frypan. Next night I made breaded fish. I am so happy. I also bought the accessory set. So I’ll be trying baking some weight watchers friendly desserts soon.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this one for the 6 quart ...
customer_reviews.text: It is way too small for my 6 quart nuwave air fryer. It said it was universal and would fit. Don't waste your money on this one for the 6 quart size. I sent it back.

customer_reviews.title: Size is fine, but the silicone has strong smell.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Phillips XL Airfryer and these fit fine. Anything bigger wouldn't. However, the silicone mat and muffin pan have a strong smell even after washing them a few times.

customer_reviews.title: Greatly increase the amount of food I can cook at one time.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the silicone products yet but I use the racks every time I use the air fryer. We are a family of four and the rack greatly increase the amount of food we can cook at one time. Recipe book is nice too.

customer_reviews.title: A must if you air fry. . .

customer_reviews.title: All the accessories you need!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my accessory kit, and I LOVE it!!! It fits perfectly in my Cook's Essentials 3.5 qt air fryer, which the maximum diameter is 7 inches. It has all the accessories you could ever need. Looking forward to using the muffin pan.

customer_reviews.text: The pizza pan does not fit a 3.7 quart Cosori. The picture with the purple line indicates the pizza pan is 7 inches, that is incorrect, it is more like 7 1/2 inches see the picture. The quality and value is good but the picture is deceptive.

I have a 3.7 quarts air fryer and these accessories are too small for it ! Instead making a cake on it , it’s more like making a cupcake ! Not good! Waste of money ! I do not recommend unless your air fryer is maybe a 1.7 quart or something!

customer_reviews.title: Small

customer_reviews.text: A must buy! I make fat free pinchos and bacalaitos on these things! A great investment in my kitchen!

customer_reviews.title: The only thing better than having an Air-Fryer is having accessories for your air fryer!!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing better than having an Air-Fryer is having more accessories to use with the Air-Fryer!! Easy to use, cook with, and clean!
customer_reviews.author: K.Lani Lucas

product_meta.title: Air Fryer Accessories for Gowise Phillips and Cozyna, Deluxe Set of 6, Fit all 3.7QT
product_meta.description:
Cook more than ever before with the 6 Piece Cozyna Air Fryer Accessory Set! 

Air Fryer Accessory Set Includes:

1 x Cake Barrel

1 x Mini Cake Silicone Pan

1 x Pizza Pan

1 x Metal Holder

1 x Multi-Purpose Rack with Skewers

1 x Silicone Mat

1 x Cookbook

Cake Barrel: 

Bake your favorite cake, bread or quiche in the Cake Barrel! The even-wall construction allows for optimal heating, while the handle allows for convenience and easy maneuverability!

Pizza Pan:

Aside from experimenting with different pizza recipes, this Pizza Pan also provides the perfect surface for a variety of other treats! You can use it to make pancakes, eggs, potatoes, quesadillas or even giant cookies! With the air fryer accessories grill pan, the possibilities are limitless!

Metal Holder

Maximize your cooking surface with the Metal Holder. Simply prepare your food as desired and place one layer of food in the air fryer basket as usual. Next, place this Metal Holder on top and finally add your second layer of food on the metal grate. Now you will have complete meals ready in no time!

Multi-Purpose Rack with Skewers

 The Multi-Purpose Rack not only maximizes your cooking space, but it also comes with 3 skewers. These skewers are perfect for vegetable and meat shish kabobs while the bottom layer is perfect for sides! 

Silicone Mat

The Silicone Mat provides you with a heat-resistant surface to place your hot accessories on. Use an oven-safe mitt to remove your accessory from the air fryer and place it on the Silicone Mat. 

WARNING: Do not touch the accessories until they have completely cooled!
feature_bullets: 100 percent COMPATIBLE WITH PHILIPS AIR FRYER AND MORE This universal Air Fryer Accessory set fits all standard Air Fryers 3.7qt. Each accessory pairs especially well with all Cozyna, Philips, Gowise and Power Air Fryers.

6 PIECE AIR FRYER ACCESSORY KIT. This Cozyna Air Fryer Accessory Kit includes 1 Mini Cake silicone pan, 1 Cake Barrel, 1 Pizza Pan, 1 Metal Holder, 1 Multi Purpose Rack with Skewers and 1 Silicone Mat
